sys_script_include.name: getTotalPrice

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_843001_final_app.getTotalPrice</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getTotalPrice</name><script><![CDATA[var newValue = g_form.setValue('final_product_price', '0');
var ga = new GlideAjax('getTotalPrice');
ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getTotalSum');
ga.addParam('sysparm_orderLineSysId', newValue);
ga.getXML(TotalPrice);





function TotalPrice(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
    var parsedBody = JSON.parse(answer);
    g_form.setValue('final_product_price', parsedBody.result);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-27 07:10:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>4bd66f379734511026dadb24a253af3a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getTotalPrice</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Final Application" source="x_843001_final_app">112ed6579734111026dadb24a253afe2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Final Application">112ed6579734111026dadb24a253afe2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4bd66f379734511026dadb24a253af3a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-27 08:15:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
